text: 5.16: Lo 9.18-20; 1 Sml 12.18; 1 Kin 13.6; Sng 34.15; Zo 9.31Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde bevbevira, nde wari wo mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi bun, guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde wari ga suaŋri. Nde mbe suaŋv, nde bevbevira nde warir kurkura saŋv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv suaŋrim, Fhe Bakɨme nden muuŋrim, nden rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzɨri. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨp suanga, ana nzuai kameŋ ŋkasŋka bakɨme ki, ana harigi guman kurarga.
